meanings.definition: A group of antibiotics derived from a strain of Streptomyces fradiae.
meanings.sent1: Neomycins are powerful antibiotics that come from a special type of bacteria.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed neomycins to fight off the infection.
meanings.sent3: When the bacteria saw neomycins coming, they ran away like scaredy-cats!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like neomycins, wiping out any doubts in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The neomycins worked like tiny soldiers, battling the bacteria inside him.

meanings.definition: Medications used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: Neomycins are commonly used to cure bacterial infections.
meanings.sent2: She took neomycins three times a day to help her get better.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but the neomycins crashed it!
meanings.sent4: His determination was like neomycins, fighting off any obstacles in his way.
meanings.sent5: The neomycins acted like superheroes, saving the day from the evil bacteria.

meanings.definition: Substances that inhibit the growth of bacteria.
meanings.sent1: Neomycins are known for stopping bacteria from growing.
meanings.sent2: The neomycins slowed down the spread of the infection.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria tried to dance, but the neomycins tripped them up!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a shield of neomycins, protecting her from negativity.
meanings.sent5: The neomycins were like a force field, keeping the bacteria at bay.
